name: anki-revision-app
description: This is a revision app built for Computing Students
author: Computing Class of 2022

scripts.electron:build: cd backend/update_database && python3 update.py && cd ../.. && vue-cli-service electron:build
scripts.electron:serve: cd backend/update_database && python3 update.py && cd ../.. && vue-cli-service electron:serve
scripts.dev: cd backend/update_database && python3 update.py && cd ../.. && vue-cli-service electron:serve
scripts.setup: pip3 install -r requirements.txt && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd backend/update_database && python3 update.py
scripts.win:dev: cd backend/update_database && py update.py && cd ../.. && vue-cli-service electron:serve
scripts.win:setup: py -m pip install -r requirements.txt && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd backend/update_database && py update.py
